item.title: Tweet
item.description: Fuck a slightly longer lasting battery, where’s my phone powered by birdsong; or by vital humours conducted via the aether; or by the smell of clean laundry? That’s the sort of thing that’ll make me get excited about tech announcements. #WWDC18 ‚ù§Ô∏è 0 | üîÉ 0
